boardOfAdvisors.name: Ambassador Ebrahim Rasool
boardOfAdvisors.bio: Ambassador Ebrahim Rasool is a distinguished diplomat and political leader with extensive experience in international relations and governance.

boardOfAdvisors.name: Dr Faisal Tariq
boardOfAdvisors.bio: Dr Faisal Tariq brings years of academic and administrative experience to his role as Secretary of the Board of Advisors.

boardOfAdvisors.name: Professor Dr Yasin Aktay
boardOfAdvisors.bio: Professor Dr Yasin Aktay is a renowned academic with expertise in political science and international relations.

boardOfAdvisors.name: Dr Mohammed Abdul Aziz
boardOfAdvisors.bio: Dr Mohammed Abdul Aziz is a respected scholar and policy expert with a focus on international development.

boardOfAdvisors.name: Lubaaba Al-Azami
boardOfAdvisors.bio: Lubaaba Al-Azami brings valuable expertise in strategic planning and organizational development.

researchTeam.name: Dr Gulshanara Begum
researchTeam.bio: Dr Gulshanara Begum leads our research initiatives with her extensive experience in social sciences.

researchTeam.name: Dr Nazmus Sakib
researchTeam.bio: Dr Nazmus Sakib specializes in international relations and global politics.

researchTeam.name: Dr Faroque Amin
researchTeam.position: Research Fellow in Politics and Religion
researchTeam.bio: Dr Faroque Amin focuses on the intersection of politics and religion in contemporary societies.

researchTeam.name: Mohammad Hossain
researchTeam.bio: Mohammad Hossain contributes to our environmental policy research initiatives.

researchTeam.name: Abdullah Mahmud Nazib
researchTeam.position: Research Intern for Middle Eastern Studies
researchTeam.bio: Abdullah Mahmud Nazib supports our Middle Eastern studies research program.

researchTeam.name: Adnan Bin Abdus Salam
researchTeam.bio: Adnan Bin Abdus Salam provides technical support for our research initiatives.
